name: @hbkapps/convict-provider-awsssm
description: An external provider for node-convict which allows you to get paramter values from AWS SSM's parameter store.

scripts.pretest: docker run -d --name localstack -p 4567-4597:4567-4597 -p 8080:8080 -e SERVICES='ssm' localstack/localstack; sleep 10

author: Brett Neese, HBK Engineering <bneese@hbkengineering.com>
